titleStmt.title: Positions containing a full account of a Scripture-line of time, in the whole, and from joynt to joynt; together with a judgment according to Scripture prophecy on the present Turkish affairs.
titleStmt.author: Beverley, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: "A postscript to the reader" signed: T. Beverley.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
